v.v: Elihu finished speaking by saying this:
“Job, be patient with me a little longer
I will tell you what I have learned from many sources,
I will not say anything to you that is false;
Really, God is very powerful, and he does not despise anyone,
He does not allow wicked people to remain alive—contrary to what you have claimed,
He always watches over those who are righteous;
However, if people who commit crimes are caught,
then God shows them what they have done;
He causes them to listen to what he is warning them,
If they listen to him and serve him,
But if they do not listen to him,
People who fail to honor God continue being angry,
They die while they are still young,
God actually rescues people by causing them to suffer;
Job, I think that God wants to bring you out of your troubles
However, now he is punishing you as he would punish the wicked;
Do not let your anger give you an excuse to mock other people,
If that happens, it certainly will not help you to cry out when you are distressed;
Do not wish that it would be nighttime in order that you might mistreat others without anyone knowing it;
Be careful not to begin doing evil deeds,
Truly, people praise God because he is so powerful;
No one has told him what he should do,
People have always sung songs to praise him,
All people have seen what he has done,
How great God is! We are not able to know how great he is,
He draws water up from the earth and puts it in clouds
the rain pours down from the sky
No one can understand how the clouds move across the sky
He causes lightning to flash all around him,
By providing plenty of rain for everyone,
It is as though he were holding the lightning in his hands,
When we hear his thunder, we know that there will be a storm,
“My heart pounds when I think about that.
Listen, all of you, to the thunder,
He sends thunder all across the sky,
After the lightning flashes, we hear the thunder,
When God speaks, it causes us to fear him and admire him, as thunder does;
He commands the snow to fall on the ground,
When God does that, it prevents people from working,
When it rains, the animals go into their hiding places,
The storms come from the place in the south where they start,
In the winter water freezes when he commands it,
God fills the clouds with moisture,
He guides the clouds and causes them to move back and forth
Sometimes God sends rain to punish us, sometimes to water the land that he has made,
Job, listen to this;
Do you know how God commands the lightning to flash down from his clouds?
Do you know how God decides where to place the clouds in the sky?
No, you just sweat there in your hot clothing
Can you stretch out the skies like God does and make them as hard as a metal mirror?
Job, you know so much! So tell us what we should say to God;
Should I ask someone to tell God that I want to speak to him?
You know that people cannot look directly at the sun
God comes out of the north with a light that shines like gold;
Almighty God has very great power,
That is the reason that we have an awesome respect for him;
